==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
From [[原]] original + [[汁]] juice

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=yuánzhī
|c=jyun4 zap1
|mn=goân-chiap
|cat=n,a
}}

===Adjective===
{{zh-adj}}

# the original essence of something; the authentic
# fresh; original

====Derived terms====

* {{zh-l|原汁原味}} (fresh; no artificial flavors)
* {{zh-l|原汁搞笑}} (fresh comedy)
* {{zh-l|原汁蘆薈膠/原汁芦荟胶}} (fresh aloe juice gel)

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# the original juice that has been freshly squeezed from fruits or vegetables
# the original juice that results from cooking food; drippings

====Derived terms====

* {{zh-l|蘆薈原汁/芦荟原汁}} (aloe juice)
* {{zh-l|沙棘原汁}} ([[sea buckthorn]] juice)
* {{zh-l|葡萄原汁}} (fresh-squeezed grape juice)
